rules_text:
Solar Hatching deals 4 damage to each creature.
Coalesce {6}{R}{R} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for {6}{R}{R}. If you do, it enters as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
When Solar Hatching enters, each player chooses up to two lands they control and sacrifices the rest.
